name: Tales of Monsterland
description:
A new platform adventure for the Nintendo Gameboy, can be completed, but not yet finished, in a beta state and everything subject to change (v1.1)

Controls

Z (a) – In town: interact with character, buy. In levels: Run, attack
X (b) – Jump, cancel
Up – interact with item, go in door, sign etc
Shift (select) – Character inventory screen
Enter (start) – Menu, save, load, check game status

Click game in browser window before starting.

Tips

  • Talk to everyone in the village
  • Save often
  • Some areas you'll need to go back to when you've gained an ability
  • Check your status to see what's left to collect

Outstanding

  • More levels, larger
  • Gameboy art, cart art, instructions/manual
  • Graphical improvements (cut scenes, house interiors, palette swapping)
  • Better combat & general gameplay mechanics improvements
  • More enemies
  • Easter eggs, hidden areas
  • More form utility
  • Bug fixes
  • Physical version
